title: Change Auto Insurance Deductible
description: A customer wants to lower their monthly premium by raising their collision deductible.

tasks.description: Identify the policyholder and their current deductible amounts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the customer's policy and notes their current deductibles.

tasks.description: Present the premium savings for different, higher deductible options.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent shows the customer how much they would save by increasing their deductible from $500 to $1000.

tasks.description: Update the policy with the new deductible chosen by the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the policy and confirms the new premium.
